phrases: The four-year-olds and under are not here?
What you said to me before, I thought about it...
Everyone above five years old is on our side.
They were surprised, but I think everything will be okay.
Our next training is under way too.
So, what do we do next?
And would they be able to hide it afterwards?
I wonder if we can really take them.
It is not like I do not believe in Norman's plan.
But it is a cliff, it is winter, and Norman's not here.
Even after we get out, there will be unpredictable situations.
I know it is a little late to say this, but maybe Ray's thinking is also correct.
If we take them with us, we cannot let them get killed.
But if we leave them here, they will get shipped out.
Even still, I cannot leave them.
I do not want anyone to get shipped out anymore.
I want to take my whole family.
what about the kids in the other plants?
Is it fine for only us to escape?
We have never seen them, but...
they are next door to us, are not they?
Not knowing anything, just like us...
I have something to tell you.
So it is just like I thought.
I was thinking this whole time.
When we were playing tag, I wondered what Sister meant when she said harvest.
She was looking through Ray's drawers,
and Emma, when Norman left, you were really scared of Mom.
I always thought it was weird.
I will not take them now.
The others do not know about the House or the fire.
I am leaving that situation to Phil.
Phil, I need you to listen carefully.
I am hesitating between two choices right now.
Should I take everyone, including the babies?
Or should I leave the kids who are under four years old?
We only get harvested when we turn six years old.
Even for Marnya, who has the earliest birthday, will have at least a year and a half.
And 15 of the older kids will be gone.
If this House focuses on quality over quantity, then the pace of harvesting should go down.
In order to raise high-quality kids again, they cannot kill the younger ones who have potential.
On that point, the six kids who are four years old, including you, have good scores.
At worst, I estimate that we have two years of time.
But I have not given up.
I will definitely return within two years.
That is when I will take Phil and the others, as well as all the kids in the other four plants.
Phil, where are the other children?
Where is Emma and everyone else?
I am going to get them now.
Do not worry, I will be right back.
Everyone, make sure to stay here.
It went off earlier than expected.
We are still far from the bridge.
There is an alert from Plant Three.
Following the fire in that plant, 15 kids have escaped.
From this point forward, it will be dealt with maximum security.
You can kill the others who are not high-quality.
However, do not damage any of their heads.
Do not let them get away!
Try and escape if you can...
But at that time, Norman said...
If we are escaping, it will be through the bridge.
But that is what anyone would think.
There is no way we will cross the cliff.
That is why we will not go to the bridge.
We will escape from the cliff.
I checked the distance to the other side as well as the geographical features.
It is dangerous, but there is a spot where you can cross.
- So close! - You can do it!
As long as the first person can cross...
Well, we were able to completely fool you.
You will show me something cool, so shut up and come, huh?
It is a scenery we never thought we would see.
I thought it would not be possible to take everyone.
I thought they would be a hindrance.
But in the end, I made a decision, and it is thanks to Emma.
Everyone joined with full faith because it is Emma.
She is reckless and unreasonable, but she is honest,
and can say we are taking everyone without a second thought.
You do not have to give up, Ray.
Those children have not appeared at the bridge yet?
When I think that there is a cliff below...
You still have the rope we used to pull everyone up, right?
Can you tie Jemima to me using that?
Do you know how to go down?
Do not tell me you cannot do this.
Okay, you are the last one!
Goodbye, our home that we loved so much.
I was climbing trees and I heard a beautiful song, so...
What is the name of the song?
It does not have a name.
Let me hear more of it!
But it is embarrassing, so do not tell everyone else.
I am going to put you in charge of Plant Three starting next year.
How do you know that song?
Why did you give birth to me?
But I guess I have had enough.
And I pray that you will find light.
You must have been cold and lonely.
I will definitely come back to get everyone else.
Today we take the first step.
